item.description:
FINALLY Overcome Your Fears That Have Been Destroying Your Dating Life...

Eliminate Inner Game Challenges Like Nervousness, Self-doubt And Anxiety That Are Holding You Back From TRUE Success In Your Dating Life...This Will Be The Most Important Meetup Ever!

Have you ever screwed up an important situation with the opposite sex that could have led to a good date or great relationship?

Be honest with me here.

I want to know…

Have you ever been talking to someone you felt attracted to but got so nervous you stumbled over your words or didn't know what to say at all?

Or have you ever been in a relationship with someone and wanted them to be a certain way so much that you literally drove them away?

Or have you ever saw someone that you wanted to start a conversation with but your emotions went CRAZY at even the THOUGHT of approaching them and you just decided that it would be easier to walk away than to overcome your fear...Only to beat yourself up over not approaching them later?

Or have you ever felt like a certain person could actually control your emotions and your happiness was dependent on whether they liked you or not?

Have you ever had one of these things happen to you?

If you answered yes to either of those questions, then read this description very carefully

THE BIG SECRET - Why is dating so difficult?

What I found was that everyone tries to fix problems in the moment…  Like what to say to start a conversation or how to get that date BUT you’re not SOLVING the problem itself.

For example, you probably already know how you could just say "hi" to an attractive person when you wanted to meet them BUT you still get nervous every time the chance to meet someone your really attracted to comes along and your stuck without the date you really want.

The real “Secret”Uncovered!

I realized that instead of trying to deal with a problem IN THE MOMENT… You can fix most problems before they happen.  Completely eliminate anxiety, fear, nervousness, self-doubt and then dating problems disappear and what once felt impossible is almost effortless.

That's why I decided to put on a special "inner game" work shop.

You'll learn simple, proven psychological tricks that eliminate fear, anxiety and nervousness almost over night. Once you master these simple skills, you'll have the confidence to approach people in any situation, date the type of people you want to date, and be in control of your own emotions.

Imagine being at a Meetup event and gliding around the room talking with anyone and everyone. You'll surprise yourself with how easy and effortless it is to get the type of dates you want once your fear and anxiety is gone.  You'll be able to make friends and attract lovers anywhere you go, anytime you want.

*************************************************
HERE'S A SMALL SAMPLE OF WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:
*************************************************


  • A detailed, step-by-step process to build self-esteem that works every single time.
  • An almost magical way to break your stubborn destructive habits quickly, easily, and permanently… in just under 5 minutes and the best part is you replace them with constructive habits that FORCE you to become successful

  • A powerful exercise to eliminate any “inner block” that has held you back since childhood – fast and forever (Unfortunately most people will go their entire lives without REALLY eliminating the things that prevent them from true success)
  • A step-by-step simple exercise that cures anxiety FAST… so you’ll never again hesitate when you see someone you want to meet again.

  • And much more!

    *************************************************
    HOW TO GET INVOLVED
    *************************************************

    The meeting is limited to 20 people due to the size limitations of the classroom (we'll be moving around a lot). Our meetings usually sell out quickly, so here's what I recommend.

    #1 - Check your calendar right now, and see if you have Sunday, May 15th available. The meeting runs from 3:30pm to 5:30pm and is conveniently located in Harvard Square, less than 5 minutes walk from the red line.

    #2 - If you have that afternoon free, go ahead and RSVP for this workshop right now. Trust me, it's going to fill up fast. They always do.

    #3 - Write it in your calendar so you remember to attend, and please arrive at 3:15pm for registration and personal networking.

    The cost of the event is only $20, which is a bargain for a professional training that includes these skill-building drills + personality feedback. Please remember to bring:

    • $20 cash
    • A pen
    • A great attitude
    • And a willingness to learn fun, new things.

    I'm looking forward to seeing you there.

    Eric

    P.S. - Take down my cell number in case you have any questions about the event or if you get lost. The venue is extremely easy to find, so you should have no problems. My cell is: 617-903-7371
item.how_to_find_us: Go in the front door. The signs will point you to the room.
item.why: FINALLY Overcome Your Fears That Have Been Destroying Your Dating Life... Eliminate Inner Game Challenges Like Nervousness, Self-doubt And Anxiety That Are Holding You Back From TRUE Success In Your Dating Life...
item.name: New Breakthroughs In Psychology Help You Eliminate The Anxiety and Fear
